issue.title: Dependency Problem with ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros and libgazebo7

content.raw:
Our install test job only started failing today:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/306

~~~
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 gazebo8 : Depends: libgazebo8 (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
           Depends: libsdformat5 but it is not going to be installed
           Recommends: gazebo8-plugin-base but it is not going to be installed
 libgazebo8-dev : Depends: libsdformat5-dev but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: libgazebo8 (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: gazebo8-plugin-base (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-plugins : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: libignition-math2 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros-control : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                                   Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                                   Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-ros but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros-pkgs : Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-plugins but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-ros but it is not going to be installed
~~~
content.html:
Our install test job only started failing today:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/306
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 gazebo8 : Depends: libgazebo8 (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
           Depends: libsdformat5 but it is not going to be installed
           Recommends: gazebo8-plugin-base but it is not going to be installed
 libgazebo8-dev : Depends: libsdformat5-dev but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: libgazebo8 (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: gazebo8-plugin-base (= 8.2.0-1~xenial) but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-plugins : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: libignition-math2 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                               Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros-control : Depends: libgazebo7 but it is not going to be installed
                                   Depends: libsdformat4 but it is not going to be installed
                                   Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-ros but it is not going to be installed
 ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros-pkgs : Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-dev but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-msgs but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-plugins but it is not going to be installed
                                Depends: ros-kinetic-gazebo-ros but it is not going to be installed

issue.title: Dependency Problem with ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros and libgazebo7
Dependency Problem with ros-kinetic-gazebo8-ros and libgazebo7

content.raw:
The version 2.5.14-2 should fix the problem.

Testing run:
  - https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/311/console
content.html:
The version 2.5.14-2 should fix the problem.

Testing run: - https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/311/console
